flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
My Macbook Pro gets pretty warm when taxed with running games and heavy apps. I needed a way to cool it and raise it up from the surface of my desk. I was unimpressed with all of the retail laptop cooling stands with fans in them. The seem very overpriced for a chunk of plastic or metal and two low power fans. There are several DIY guides to making a laptop stand with fans from cardboard boxes and such but I wanted something sturdy and reliable.

So I built one myself out of spare parts.
